item.description:
Let's meet at Cambridge Common, located near Harvard Square on Mass Ave. For a map of the park in relation to Harvard Square, click here.

We'll meet at 4:00 on Sunday and throw the ball around while getting to know each others' names. After warming up we'll get a game going! Check out our About Us page for a list of game rules as well as rules we've bent to accommodate all players. Between 6:00-7:00 we'll head over to a restaurant to finish up with conversation over food and drinks.

For those who take public transportation, the Harvard T stop and the 66 bus stop are a couple blocks away (see the map). Parking is free on Sundays as well. Send me a note if you have any questions!

**Note: We're going to alternate between Saturday and Sunday games. If you can't make it this week, look for a Saturday game next week! And keep in mind, Patriots are playing this Sunday at 8:15 so you have plenty of time to join us for flag football!
item.name: Flag Football on Cambridge Common
